minutes_text:
VETERANS SERVICES DEPARTMENT
Therese Wrobel, Chairman • Michael Salyers, Vice Chairman
Joel Rutherford, Secretary • Lance Pittman, Member at Large
Manny Gonzales, Member at Large • David Archer, Member at Large
Robert Slavko, Member at Large • Laura Rios, Chief Veterans Service Officer
Mark A. Hackel
County Executive
VETERANS SERVICE COMMITTEE
Tuesday, December 16, 2025
MINUTES
1. Meeting called to order by Chair Wrobel at 10:05AM
2. Pledge of Allegiance and Moment of Silence for our POW’s, MIA’s and the brave men
and women that serve our great Nation so we can meet here today.
3. Adoption of the Agenda. Motioned by Gonzales, 2nd by Pittman. Motion carried.
4. Approval of the Minutes of November 18, 2025. Motioned by Gonzales, 2nd by Archer.
Motion carried.
5. Public Participation. None
6. Move that the Board meets in closed session, according to the Open Meetings Act to
hear/review requests for assistance. Motioned by Salyers, 2nd by Pittman. Motion
carried at 10:08AM
7. Move that the Board returns to open session. Motion by Rutherford, 2nd by Slavko.
Motion carried at 10:40AM
8. Unfinished Business
a. Discussion on mortgage company cooperation issues.
b. Discussed emergent need criteria.
9. New Business
a. Two cases presented-Two cases denied.
10. Adjournment: Motion by Rutherford, 2nd by Gonzales. Motion carried at 11:03AM
Next Meeting January 6, 2026, at 11:00AM
21885 Dunham Road, Suite 3 • Clinton Township, Michigan 48036
Phone: (586) 469-5315 • Fax: (586) 469-5316
macombvets.org

Move the Board return to Open Session.
Adjournment. Next meeting January 6, 2026 at 11:00. Happy New Year/

title: Meeting
body: Civil Service Commission
location: 120 N. Main Street, Mt. Clemens, Michigan, 48043
agenda_text:
MACOMB COUNTY
CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION MEETING
Wednesday, December 17, 2025, 9:00 AM
120 N. Main, Mount Clemens, 48043
1st Floor Small Conference Room
AGENDA
1. Call to Order and Roll Call
2. Adoption of Agenda
a) Review and approve the agenda for December 17, 2025
3. Minutes
a) Review and approve the minutes of December 10, 2025
4. Public Participation
5. Business
6. Personnel
a) Review and approve the Corrections Deputy eligibility list
b) Review and approve the Dispatch eligibility list
c) Review and approve the Deputy eligibility list
d) Review and approve the Dispatch Supervisor eligibility list
e) Review and approve the Law Enforcement Sergeant eligibility list
f) Review and approve the Lieutenant eligibility list
g) Review and approve the Captain eligibility list
h) Receive and file memo from Undersheriff Darga and Recommendation to Fill Position forms for:
Kristijan Dushaj Deputy Recruit Hired effective January 5, 2026
Calib Hall Deputy Recruit Hired effective January 5, 2026
i) Review pre-employment physical and psychological evaluations and recommend hiring:
Joshua Baier Deputy
7. Old Business
a) Review pre-employment psychological evaluation for Theophanis Goudiotis and recommend for
hire, TABLED from December 17, 2025
8. New Business
9. Adjournment
minutes_text:
MACOMB COUNTY
CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION MEETING
Wednesday, December 17, 2025, 9:00 AM
120 N. Main, Mount Clemens, 48043
1ST Floor Conference Room
MINUTES
1. Call to Order and Roll Call
The meeting was called to order by the Chairperson at 9:00 AM at 120 N. Main Street, 1st Floor,
Mount Clemens, Michigan 48043.
Present: Robert Stanley, Thomas Stawski, Patrick Maceroni
Others: HRLR, Mia Mezini, Sheriff's Office Lt. Jason Conklin
Absent: Corporation Counsel John Schapka
2. Adoption of Agenda
a) Review and approve the agenda for December 17, 2025
Motion to adopt the agenda dated Wednesday, December 17, 2025. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
3. Minutes
a) Review and approve the minutes of December 10, 2025
Motion to approve the minutes of December 10, 2025. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski

4. Public Participation
NONE.
5. Business
NONE.
6. Personnel
a) Review and approve the Corrections Deputy eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
b) Review and approve the Dispatch eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
c) Review and approve the Deputy eligiblility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
Macomb County Clerk’s Office  120 N. Main, Mount Clemens, MI 48043  (586) 783-8142  Fax: (586) 469-5123

d) Review and approve the Dispatch Supervisor eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
e) Review and approve the Law Enforcement Sergeant eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
f) Review and approve the Lieutenant eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
g) Review and approve the Captain eligibility list
Motion to approve the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
Macomb County Clerk’s Office  120 N. Main, Mount Clemens, MI 48043  (586) 783-8142  Fax: (586) 469-5123

h) Receive and file memo from Undersheriff Darga and Recommendation to Fill Position forms for:
Kristijan Dushaj Deputy Recruit Hired effective January 5, 2026
Calib Hall Deputy Recruit Hired effective January 5, 2026
Motion to receive and file the above. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
i) Review pre-employment physical and psychological evaluations and recommend hiring:
Joshua Baier Deputy
Motion to approve the above for hire. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
7. Old Business
a) Review pre-employment psychological evaluation for Theophanis Goudiotis and recommend for
hire, TABLED from December 17, 2025
Motion to approve the above for hire. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Thomas Stawski
Seconded by: Patrick Maceroni
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski
8. New Business
NONE.
9. Adjournment
Motion to adjourn the December 17, 2025 meeting at 09:36 AM. THE MOTION PASSED.
Motioned by: Patrick Maceroni
Seconded by: Thomas Stawski
Vote Summary: (3 - 0 - 0)
Aye - Robert Stanley, Patrick Maceroni, Thomas Stawski

title: Meeting
body: Community Mental Health Board - Full Board
location: 1 S. Main Street, Mt. Clemens, MI, 48043
agenda_text:
Our Mission: Macomb County Community Mental Health,
guided by the values, strengths, and informed choices of the PEOPLE WE SERVE,
provides quality services which promote
recovery, community participation, self-sufficiency, and independence.
Community Mental Health Board
Phil Kraft Selena M. Schmidt Lori Phillips
Chair Vice Chair Secretary/Treasurer
Megan Burke Nick Ciaramitaro Sherita Harvey
Donna Cangemi Wayne Conner Julia Mendyka
Jackie Catinella Dana Freers Antoinette Wallace
Phil Kraft Antoinette Wallace Lori Phillips
Chair Vice Chair Secretary/Treasurer
DATE/TIME: Wednesday, December 17, 2025, 6:00 PM
COMMITTEE: Full Board
COMMITTEE CHAIR/VICE CHAIR: Chair Kraft, Vice Chair Schmidt
COMMITTEE MEMBERS: Committee of the Whole
LOCATION: Administration Building, One South Main Street, 9th Floor, Mount Clemens, MI 48043
AGENDA
1. Call to Order
a) Pledge of Allegiance
2. Reading of the Mission Statement
3. Adoption of Agenda
4. Hearing of the Public
5. Minutes
a) Request to approve the CMH Full Board meeting minutes from November 25, 2025.
6. Approval of Standing Committee Meetings Minutes/Recommendations
a) No CMH Board Program and Budget meeting in December 2025. No minutes to review.
7. Request to Approve
a) Request to approve the contract with Traci Smith as MCCMH's CEO beginning 1/1/2026.
(Approved by OCE & legal)
b) Request to approve an engagement letter from Roslund, Prestage & Company in the amount of
$25,000 for the FY25 Compliance Audit. (Approved by legal)
c) Request for approval to contract for Occupational, Speech and Physical Therapy.
8. Receive and File
a) No items.
9. Resolutions
a) No items.
10. Voucher Listings
a) Request to approve vouchers for 11-15-25 through 12-5-25
11. Management Report
a) CFO Update
b) CEO Update
12. Other Possible Agenda Items

a) REMINDER: CMH Board - RRAC Meeting - Thursday, December 18, 2025 @8am - CMH Admin
Office
b) REMINDER: CMH Board Program and Budget Meeting - Wednesday, January 14, 2026 @6pm
c) REMINDER: CMH Full Board Meeting - Wednesday, January 28, 2026 @6pm
13. Provider Comments
14. Hearing of the Public
15. Closed Session
a) To discuss attorney client privilege memo dated 12-17-25. Pursuant to MCL 15.268(1)(h)
16. Adjournment

``
Macomb County Board of Commissioners

District 04 District 10 District 03

COMMITTEE: Joint Government Oversight and Health and Human Services Committees
CHAIR: Government Oversight Chair Harold L. Haugh; Health and Human Services Chair Sarah Lucido
LOCATION: Administration Building, One South Main Street, 9th Floor, Mount Clemens, MI 48043

2. Pledge of Allegiance
3. Adoption of Agenda
4. Approval of Minutes
a) Joint Government Oversight and Finance/Audit/Budget Committees Minutes dated December 2,
2025 (Including Closed Session)
b) Joint Internal Services and Health and Human Services Committees Minutes dated December 3,
2025

a) Solid Waste Planning Committee
Executive appointment with Board concur
2 vacancies; 2 -year term to expire on September 30, 2027
Gus Ghanam
Josh Bocks
b) Solid Waste Planning Committee
Executive Appointment with Board concur
1 vacancy; 2-year term to expire on September 30, 2027
Vicky Rowinski

Executive reappointment with Board concur
1 vacancy; 3-year term to expire on December 31, 2028
Danielle Burd
d) Macomb County Ethics Board
Executive reappointment with Board concur

Karen Smith

Commissioner appointment
bocmacomb.org

AGENDA – PAGE 2
District 12 vacancy; partial term to expire December 31, 2027
Jay-Michael Jackson

January 1, 2026 to December 31, 2028 / Karlyn Semlow, Director of Human Resources and Labor
Relations
b) Collective Bargaining Agreement: Road Technicians Association (ROADTECH) - January 1, 2026
to December 31, 2028 / Karlyn Semlow, Director of Human Resources and Labor Relations
8. Resolutions
a) Receive and File Only - Item Pending Appraisal
Resolution 2025-14157: A Resolution Authorizing Transfer of Certain County Real Property to
Macomb Community College
9. Proclamations
a) A Proclamation Celebrating the 75th Anniversary of the City of St. Clair Shores / Sarah Lucido,
Commissioner, District 13, Barbara Zinner, Commissioner, District 9, Joe Sabatini, Board Chair,
District 4
10. Health and Human Services Committee
11. Health and Human Services Committee Department Recommendations
a) Budget Amendment: Macomb Community Action - Every Family Fed Fund New Grant Award
($50,000) / Edward Scott, Director, Macomb Community Action
12. Health and Human Services Committee Correspondence
a) Resignation Letter: Rev. Ralph Brown - Macomb County Human Services Board and the Martha T.
Berry Medical Care Facility Board of Directors effective January 31, 2026
13. Public Participation (three minutes max per speaker)
14. Commissioners' Comments
15. Adjournment
